text: phwk khea midi rx khxy xari nxkcak kar thi ma la xik ah ca mayang phwk khea hrux kar thi phracea khxng cea ca ma hrux kar thi sayyan bang xyang hæng phracea khxng cea ca ma wan thi sayyan bang xyang hæng phracea khxng cea ma nan ca mi xanwy prayochn kæ chiwit hnung chiwit dı sung kar sraththa khxng khea doythi khea midi sraththa ma kxn hrux midi sæwngha khwam di dı «wi nı kar sraththa khxng khea cng klaw theid(muhammad) wa phwk than cng rx kan theid thæcring phwk rea k pen phu rx khxy
